description: Still trying to find the perfect roommate situation, Orlando Fox gears up for yet another round of audition interviews, and first on his list is Mark Long. Mark is interested in the place but seems to be a bit short on cash. He's sort of hoping he can work something out with Orlando, who takes one look at Mark's package and decides he can probably figure out an arrangement.Sampling the goods, he pulls Mark pants down and unfurls Mark's giant cock. Orlando's eyes light up as Mark's head nearly pokes his eye out, but he deep throats it nonetheless as Mark closes his eyes and dreams of cheap rent. Orlando fixes Mark with a blindfold and continues to suck him off, breaking midway through mount Mark and ride him blindfolded.Mark slips the blindfold to see Orlando riding like a champ, so he grabs him from behind and begins pounding him from behind, then pile driving him into the floor as Mark hovers over him, pulling out and spraying the first of what will hopefully be many loads, all over his new roomie.
title: Roommate Auditions Part 2
